skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. The chance increases to 50% if the target is under a [Fear] or [True Fear] debuff.
skills.name: Shatter Confidence
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns and a [True Fear] debuff for 1 turn. Champions from the High Elf and Dark Elf Factions cannot resist these debuffs.
skills.name: Bane of Elves
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore [Shield] buffs. 

Decreases the cooldown of the Battle Flow skill by 2 turns, fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 30%, and places a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if this attack kills an enemy.
skills.name: Battle Flow
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Heals this Champion by 50% of their MAX HP every time this Champion kills an enemy. 

Also grants an Extra Turn every time this Champions kills an enemy from the High Elf or Dark Elf Factions.
skills.name: Healthy Grudge [P]
